title: 10 Undeniably Chic Ways to Wear Red From Head to Toe
description: Fiery monochrome looks are this season's must-try.
excerpt: Fiery monochrome looks are this season's must-try.
text: Last year, it was clear to see that red dominated the runway, with brands like Valentino, Ferragamo, Chocheng, and Cong Tri showcasing head-to-toe red ensembles for Spring 2025. For the year ahead, red appears to be ensuring its staying power. Giambattista Valli unveiled a grandiose red gown for the brand’s Haute Couture Spring/Summer 2025 show. The 2025 Golden Globe Awards saw numerous celebrities styled in bold red gowns, including stunning looks by Isabella Rossellini, Dakota Fanning, Emma Stone, and Maren Morris. Guests were also spotted wearing all red while attending Paris Haute Couture Spring-Summer 2025 shows, hinting that red remains a favored choice for 2025’s adventurous palette.The color red has deeply mixed reactions throughout history and can evoke a strong response. It can indeed seem like a daring choice if you typically reach for more muted colors and neutrals, but you can always keep it simple and add a small splash of color with a cherry handbag or a pair of cardinal flats. If you’re looking to add this fiery hue to your wardrobe and are unsure what to wear or how to style this attention-grabbing color, check out these daring all-red looks and find a shade that works for you. A Sophisticated Look with a Puff-Sleeve CardiganIf you lean more towards deeper shades of red, this charming puff-sleeve cardigan from Dôen has just enough drama to make a bold statement without diving into more intense hues. Pair this cardigan with comfortable jersey trousers in a matching shade, lacquered stiletto heels from Jacquemus, and timeless drop earrings from Gucci.Dôen Anisa Cardigan in CeriseMax Mara Compact Jersey TrousersJacquemus Red Les Classiques 'The High Cubisto Slingbacks'Jil Sander Small Folded Clutch Bag Gucci Blondie Pearl Drop EarringsClinique Pop Plus Creamy Lip Gloss Moody and Elegant in a Comfortable Dress and HeelsOxblood is another muted red hue perfect for those drawn to rich jewel tones. Oxblood is universally flattering and looks incredible on most complexions. This look would be ideal for a dinner or evening event, and the Staud Ellison Dress features a bit of stretch, so that you’ll be comfortable drinking, eating, and dancing all night long.Staud Ellison DressCredit: MODA OPERANDICeline Teen Triomphe Bag in Shiny CalfskinMiu Miu Patent Leather Sandals, CrimsonBen-Anum Exclusive Madison 24K Gold-Plated Carnelian EarringsResort Ready with Strappy Heels and Gold DetailsIf you enjoy more vibrant shades of red, this show-stopping Isabel Marant dress in candy apple red will turn heads whether you’re poolside, shopping, or at a torch-lit dinner on vacation. The Prada sandals can be swapped out for flip-flops for walks on the beach, and the shoulder bag is a must to carry your favorite red lipstick and accessories.Isabel Marant Ormany DressAlaïa Le Demi Goat Leather Shoulder BagPrada Strappy Sandal in RossoBreda Relic Watch in RedA Romantic Outfit with Patent Mary Jane PumpsThe colorful tights trend is on the rise, bringing to mind Blair Waldorf’s preppy wardrobe. This look can be achieved with either sheer or opaque tights paired with patent Mary Jane pumps from Larroudé. The A-line linen dress from Reformation has a central seam, giving it a clean, tailored look. The Dior Mini Lady in cherry red further elevates this romantic outfit that’s well suited to a lunch date on Valentine’s Day.Reformation Citron Linen DressStems Avery Microfiber TightsLarroudé Women's Blair PumpsDior Mini Lady Dior BagThe Polished Look with a Velvet Hobo BagThis two-piece set from Reformation has a flattering silhouette, featuring a fitted bodice and A-line skirt. With such a punchy color commanding the spotlight, dainty jewelry, simple heels, and a mini bag are all you need to complete the look. As this outfit is limited to one hue, incorporating different textures (i.e., velvet, leather, and linen) adds some dimension and variety. The Akris Anna Bag has a beautiful chain-link accent studded with crystals that you can easily match with other accessories. This outfit is the perfect choice for colder weather, and you can even add more red with a wool wrap coat from ’S Max Mara. html:
Last year, it was clear to see that red dominated the runway, with brands like Valentino, Ferragamo, Chocheng, and Cong Tri showcasing head-to-toe red ensembles for Spring 2025. For the year ahead, red appears to be ensuring its staying power. Giambattista Valli unveiled a grandiose red gown for the brand’s Haute Couture Spring/Summer 2025 show. The 2025 Golden Globe Awards saw numerous celebrities styled in bold red gowns, including stunning looks by Isabella Rossellini, Dakota Fanning, Emma Stone, and Maren Morris. Guests were also spotted wearing all red while attending Paris Haute Couture Spring-Summer 2025 shows, hinting that red remains a favored choice for 2025’s adventurous palette.

The color red has deeply mixed reactions throughout history and can evoke a strong response. It can indeed seem like a daring choice if you typically reach for more muted colors and neutrals, but you can always keep it simple and add a small splash of color with a cherry handbag or a pair of cardinal flats. If you’re looking to add this fiery hue to your wardrobe and are unsure what to wear or how to style this attention-grabbing color, check out these daring all-red looks and find a shade that works for you.

A Sophisticated Look with a Puff-Sleeve Cardigan

If you lean more towards deeper shades of red, this charming puff-sleeve cardigan from Dôen has just enough drama to make a bold statement without diving into more intense hues. Pair this cardigan with comfortable jersey trousers in a matching shade, lacquered stiletto heels from Jacquemus, and timeless drop earrings from Gucci.

Dôen Anisa Cardigan in Cerise

Max Mara Compact Jersey Trousers

Jacquemus Red Les Classiques 'The High Cubisto Slingbacks'

Jil Sander Small Folded Clutch Bag

Gucci Blondie Pearl Drop Earrings

Clinique Pop Plus Creamy Lip Gloss

Moody and Elegant in a Comfortable Dress and Heels

Oxblood is another muted red hue perfect for those drawn to rich jewel tones. Oxblood is universally flattering and looks incredible on most complexions. This look would be ideal for a dinner or evening event, and the Staud Ellison Dress features a bit of stretch, so that you’ll be comfortable drinking, eating, and dancing all night long.

Staud Ellison Dress

Celine Teen Triomphe Bag in Shiny Calfskin

Miu Miu Patent Leather Sandals, Crimson

Ben-Anum Exclusive Madison 24K Gold-Plated Carnelian Earrings

Resort Ready with Strappy Heels and Gold Details

If you enjoy more vibrant shades of red, this show-stopping Isabel Marant dress in candy apple red will turn heads whether you’re poolside, shopping, or at a torch-lit dinner on vacation. The Prada sandals can be swapped out for flip-flops for walks on the beach, and the shoulder bag is a must to carry your favorite red lipstick and accessories.

Isabel Marant Ormany Dress

Alaïa Le Demi Goat Leather Shoulder Bag

Prada Strappy Sandal in Rosso

Breda Relic Watch in Red

A Romantic Outfit with Patent Mary Jane Pumps

The colorful tights trend is on the rise, bringing to mind Blair Waldorf’s preppy wardrobe. This look can be achieved with either sheer or opaque tights paired with patent Mary Jane pumps from Larroudé. The A-line linen dress from Reformation has a central seam, giving it a clean, tailored look. The Dior Mini Lady in cherry red further elevates this romantic outfit that’s well suited to a lunch date on Valentine’s Day.

Reformation Citron Linen Dress

Stems Avery Microfiber Tights

Larroudé Women's Blair Pumps

Dior Mini Lady Dior Bag

The Polished Look with a Velvet Hobo Bag

This two-piece set from Reformation has a flattering silhouette, featuring a fitted bodice and A-line skirt. With such a punchy color commanding the spotlight, dainty jewelry, simple heels, and a mini bag are all you need to complete the look. As this outfit is limited to one hue, incorporating different textures (i.e., velvet, leather, and linen) adds some dimension and variety. The Akris Anna Bag has a beautiful chain-link accent studded with crystals that you can easily match with other accessories.

Reformation Moya Linen Two Piece, Cherry

Maison Ernest Lidylle 100mm Patent Leather Mules

Akris Anna Mini Velvet Hobo Bag

Haverhill Petite 1 Garnet Bracelet in 14k White Gold

Sharp and Refined in an All-Red Suit and Suede Pumps

If you’re looking for something you can wear at work and on a weekend date, look no further than this ensemble, which features a Veronica Beard suit, cozy cashmere turtleneck, and plush Proenza Schouler clutch. This outfit is the perfect choice for colder weather, and you can even add more red with a wool wrap coat from ’S Max Mara.

Veronica Beard Long And Lean Dickey Jacket

Veronica Beard Mazzy Cashmere Top in Red

Veronica Beard Lebone Pant in Red

Christian Louboutin Kate Max Suede Pump in Loubi

Proenza Schouler Flip Leather Clutch in Rosewood

Zoe Lev Jewelry 14K Bezel Birthstone Stud Earrings, Garnet

The Red Power Suit with a Silky Bra

This look is subtly risqué yet still refined. Pairing a tux blazer with just a bra strikes the right balance between sophistication and sensuality and adds a sultry twist without being overt. The Maxi Intreccio Tote by Bottega Veneta fits everything you need, and the pointed-toe ankle-strap pumps complete the seductive look.

Reiss Anna Wool Blend Double Breasted Tux Blazer

Fleur Du Mal Luxe Wireless Silk Blend Triangle Bra

Reiss Anna Wool Blend Wide Leg Trousers in Red

Casadei Tiff Ankle Strap Pumps

Bottega Veneta Maxi Intreccio Tote, Bright Red

L'Atelier Nawbar 18K Gold Mini Heart Diamond Pendant

The Casually Chic Look with Leather Pants

Swap out the heels for some sneakers to dress this look down. The statement Luciana coat with wide lapels has a striking leather rope detail that complements the leather pants. Carnelian is a reddish stone representing strength, life, and creativity, so complete this look by adorning yourself with a bracelet or necklace that features the precious gem.

Sportmax Luciana Virgin Wool Wrap Coat

Courreges Logo Ribbed Knit Tank Top

Pistola Cassie Super High Rise Straight Pant

Chloé Camera Bag in Shiny Leather, Red Flame

Gianvito Rossi Robbie Sling Pumps, Rouge

Lila Rasa Red Carnelian Bracelet Melange

A Structured Flirty Dress with Bows

This over-the-top romantic look is a maximalist choice for Valentine’s day dinner, a cocktail party or holiday event. Dua Lipa and Selena Gomez are just a few celebrities who have worn similar looks that feature rose appliqués. The soft velvet envelope clutch fastens delicately with a gold button as if to protect a secret love letter.

Cliché Reborn Sculptural Rose Mini Dress In Red

Now 67% Off

Tony Bianco Lover Sandal in Red

Ninemoo Fruit Pendant Brazilian Chain Necklace - Pomegranate

Altuzarra Envelope Clutch Grenadine

The Perfect Vacation Look with Beaded Earrings and a Crochet Bag

This beachy yet effortlessly classy outfit is all about breathable fabrics and slip-on styles. The knit Proenza Schouler dress has side slits and a slipover style, so it’s a smart choice for a carefree vacation. The crochet bag by Magda Butrym is a work of art you can wear, and The Veda Sandals from Cult Gaia are easy to slip on and go.

Proenza Schouler Suki Viscose Ribbon Knit Dress

Magda Butrym Pearl Magda bag in Red Crochet

Cult Gaia Veda Sandal

Simone Rocha Red Drip Earrings
